=== Current Issues ===

=== Open Bugs ===
* Lots of non-essential keyboard issues: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/hotkey-setup/+bug/35382
* Incorrect battery icon information: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnome-power-manager/+bug/118492
* Whole screen two pixels to the right: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-trident/+bug/52321
* No support for direct rendering: https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/xserver-xorg-video-trident/+bug/118536
